news.title: Famine confirmed in Gaza City is 'failure of humanity', UN chief says
news.summary: A UN-backed body confirms famine in Gaza Strip and surrounding areas, and says half a million are facing "catastrophic" conditions.

news.title: Home Office seeks to appeal against court ruling on Epping asylum hotel
news.summary: The High Court refused a last-minute request by the Home Office to intervene in the Epping asylum hotel case.

news.title: Russia trying to stop meeting on peace and prolong war, says Zelensky
news.summary: Volodymyr Zelensky urges Western allies to impose fresh sanctions on Moscow if it shows no interest in peace.

news.title: Prison conduct and contraband: Four things we learned from Erik Menendez's parole hearing
news.summary: A phone, candles and behaviour by the long-term US inmate factored into the refusal of his release.

news.title: Royal Mail and DHL halt some deliveries to US over tariffs
news.summary: Services including Royal Mail and  DHL say they are suspending deliveries until they have proper systems in place.

news.title: Are girls being left behind in school? Experts are sounding the alarm
news.summary: Girls are still more likely to pass GCSEs, but why is the gender gap now the lowest on record?

news.title: UK agrees to pay Kenyans affected by military fire
news.summary: Thousands says they have suffered health problems or lost property after fire caused by British military.

news.title: Noel Clarke loses libel case against the Guardian over sexual misconduct allegations
news.summary: The award-winning actor sued the newspaper's publisher for printing allegations of sexual misconduct.

news.title: TikTok to lay off hundreds of UK content moderators
news.summary: The firm says it's planning to relocate work to its other offices in Europe and invest more in AI.

news.title: British Airways attendant found naked and on drugs in onboard toilet
news.summary: A blood test revealed Haden Pentecost, 41, had methamphetamine and amphetamines in his system.
